mapper.select: SELECT p.*,`permission_type` as `permissionType` from permission p join (select DISTINCT rp.pid from user_role ur join `user` u on ur.uid=u.id join role_permission rp on ur.rid=rp.rid join role r on ur.rid=r.id where u.name=#{name} and u.`status`='0' and r.status='0') t on p.id=t.pid
